"I was wondering when you'd say that!" Devilcat jumps to his feet.  
He draws and ignites his laser sword, holding it overhead in a 
gesture of determination.  "We shall destroy them utterly!"

>  aerosmith60@c... wrote:Hydras got out of his chair. He looked at 
all the bots standing on the bridge. "Well I say why waste anymore 
time. I say we hit the Maximals now and hit them hard....anyone have 
a problem with that."
